  Found [even] with compatible type.
  Success 1: [even] seems correct.
  Found [odd] with compatible type.
  Success 1: [odd] seems correct.
Question 2
  Found [merge] with compatible type.
  Success 1: [merge] seems correct.
Question 3
  Found [sort] with compatible type.
  Failure: [sort] is incorrect.
    When applied to the following argument:
    
     | [0; 0; 9; 7; 1; 8]
    it produces the following invalid result:
    [[0; 0; 7; 8; 9; 1]] A valid result is:
    
     | [0; 0; 1; 7; 8; 9]
